Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands

Class AddBook

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.AddBook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class AddBook
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
Adds a new book to the library.

It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute(Library, LocalDate) method adds a new Book to the library.

It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "addbook" command is given by the user.

The class has a constructor to initialise the fields needed to execute the command.

See Also:
Command, execute(Library, LocalDate), Book, CommandParser, AddBook(String, String, String)

  • Constructor Details

    • AddBook

      public AddBook​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String publicationYear)
      Create a new AddBook instance.

      The constructor initialises an AddBook object using the necessary fields needed for adding a new book to the library.

      Parameters:
      title - the title of the new book
      author - the author of the new book
      publicationYear - the publication year of the new book

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Library library, java.time.LocalDate currentDate) throws LibraryException
      Create and add a new Book to the library.

      The method should create a new unique id for the new book and then create a new Book object using this id and the information given by the user (book title, author and publication year) via the command line. Finally, the method adds this book to the library and prints a notification to the user that the book was successfully added.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Parameters:
      library - -
      currentDate - -
      Throws:
      LibraryException - -
      See Also:
      Library, LocalDate, BorrowBook, ReturnBook
